title: Zero Internet
name: zero-internet
description:
How does zero-rated Internet feel like? Find out yourself.

WARNING: Almost the entire Internet will stop loading after you install this addon. That is how zero-rating works. Just disable Zero Internet from Tools->Addons->Extensions to be back on the Internet
author: Akshay S Dinesh (http://learnlearn.in) <asdofindia@gmail.com>
